text: Lakhan Sahadeo Malik is a member of Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Washim Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Washim Category:Marathi politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:Living people Category:1964 births Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2019–
title: Lakhan Sahadeo Malik
